Create transcription start site features.

Source: R/features.r
create_tss.Rd

Create transcription start site features.

create_tss(x)

Arguments

x

tbl_interval() in BED format

See also

Other feature functions: create_introns(), create_utrs3(), create_utrs5()

Examples

x <- read_bed12(valr_example('mm9.refGene.bed.gz'))

create_tss(x)
#> # A tibble: 100 x 6
